Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access

Class TestAccessController3

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.SecureTestUtil
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.TestAccessController3
public class TestAccessController3 extends SecureTestUtil
Performs checks for reference counting w.r.t. AuthManager which is used by AccessController. NOTE: Only one test in here. In AMv2, there is problem deleting because we are missing auth. For now disabled. See the cleanup method.

    • systemUserConnection

      private static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Connection systemUserConnection
      The systemUserConnection created here is tied to the system user. In case, you are planning to create AccessTestAction, DON'T use this systemUserConnection as the 'doAs' user gets eclipsed by the system user.
